title: [Valley of Gold, Bazaar]
description: Brilliant crimson banners embroidered with a golden sunburst fly high above, glittering in the sunlight.  Matching ribbons wind down their varnished oak poles, ending in a bouquet of red roses.  Tall shade trees dot the landscape, their thick branches shading the ground from the heat of the sun.

Brilliant crimson banners embroidered with a golden sunburst fly high above, glittering in the moonlight.  Matching ribbons wind down their varnished oak poles, ending in a bouquet of red roses.  Tall shade trees dot the landscape, the moonlight filters through their thick branches to illuminate the area below in a soft, pale light.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
